channel.title: Enjoying bass in an apartment and getting along with neighbors?
channel.description:
Alright, bought myself the Edifier S730D sound system.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0CO3rFjalEY
Already getting threatened with the police, neighbors claim their windows are shaking. So far I've just told them to fuark off. But yea, it really shakes everything.

item.title: Enjoying bass in an apartment and getting along with neighbors?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

wow this topic is shit.

op: Just turn it down… If you’re doing a big party then inform your neighbours a few days before and warn them that you’re going to make a lot of noise.

Read full topic
